This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added Eclipse IDE support for Copilot custom instructions in documentation.
- Created "extracting information" Copilot cookbook article.
- Added known issues to GHES release notes (autolink references missing, draft PR plan upgrade prompt).
- Warned data residency users about SSH over HTTPS unavailability.
- Replaced `gray-matter` with `@gr2m/gray-matter` for frontmatter quote control.
